description: two boats on shore at left center; figures on shore, LRC; fence with foliage behind at left; water at right

Inscription and Stamp

URC, in pencil: [B.187 / II R]; LLC, in pencil: [17]; on back, in pencil: [181020]
markings: on back, stamped in red: [P / M] collector\'s stamp of A. Poulet-Malassis(Lugt 1906)
provenance: Dr. Heinrich Stinnes, Lugt 1376a (d. 1932), Köln. [James A. Bergquist, Boston, Mass., until 1997; sold in August for KOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1997-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: La Scierie du Bas-Meudon
